name: LosingControlNeedHelp
text:
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
Exhaust your alter-ego → remove LosingControlNeedHelp from the game.
You are confused. Exhaust each card with a printed [energy] resource you control. If no card was exhausted this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

name: Bus Attack
text: Forced Response: After you exhaust an [[x-men]] or [[mutant]] friendly character, deal 1 damage to that character. [crisis]

name: Reverand Stryker
text: Incite 2. Reverand Stryker cannot take damage while another minion is in play. [star] Forced Response: After Reverand Stryker attacks, he schemes. (Surge’s nemesis minion.)

name: Purifiers
text: When Revealed: Take 2 indirect damage. When Defeated: Shuffle this card into the encounter deck.

name: Media Coverage
text: Attach to your identity card. Resolve each “When Revealed” ability that you reveal 1 additional time. Alter-Ego Action: Spend a [mental] resource → discard this card.

name: Ambushed
text: When Revealed: Choose to either take 3 damage, discard an ally you control, or exhaust and stun your identity.
